content:
I seem to be randomly getting request failures from format on save sometimes with The pipe has been ended. Is this a known issue?
I have a lot of odd things like custom toolchains (but im running nightly on this) and rustc source stuff so that may be it? Im not sure.

this is the full error

[Error - 8:19:26 PM] Request textDocument/formatting failed.
  Message: The pipe has been ended. (os error 109)
  Code: -32603

@Laurențiu It doesn't say anything other than that :/
cargo fmt works just fine though
so i presume its not rustfmt, its rust analyzer
If it's a custom rustfmt, are you passing the edition argument?
No it is not a custom rustfmt its the nightly one, but this is an edition 2021 crate, however, it seems to be happening on non-2021 too
No idea, then. A test case would be appreciated, more so if it doesn't involve rust-lang/rust
